p: In all the EOs from the studied species of Nectandra, we identified substances from the classes of monoterpenic hydrocarbons, oxygenated monoterpenes, sesquiterpenic hydrocarbons, and oxygenated sesquiterpenes. The chemical compositions of EOs from N. grandiflora and N. lanceolata were similar; both had the highest relative proportion of substances from the class of oxygenated sesquiterpenes. However, the EO profile of N. megapotamica showed more substances from the classes of monoterpenic and sesquiterpenic hydrocarbons ( Table 1).
